title: Iron Axe
summaries: The Iron Axe is an early game Axe, stronger than the starting Copper Axe and weaker than the Silver or Tungsten Axe. It has an alternate ore version, the Lead Axe, which is actually slightly stronger. Like all axes, it is used to cut down trees, cacti and giant glowing mushrooms.
In Journey Mode you start out with a Iron Axe, along with an Iron Shortsword, and an Iron Pickaxe.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.

statistics.Sell: 320
